## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Security fix

## Testing

<!-- Describe the tests you ran to verify your changes -->

- [ ] Tests pass locally
- [ ] Added new tests for new functionality
- [ ] Updated existing tests

## Security Checklist

- [ ] Pre-commit security hooks pass locally
- [ ] No secrets or credentials committed
- [ ] Dependencies scanned for vulnerabilities
- [ ] Code reviewed for security issues (SQL injection, XSS, etc.)
- [ ] Input validation added where necessary
- [ ] Authentication/authorization properly implemented
- [ ] Sensitive data properly encrypted/protected

## Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] No unnecessary dependencies added

## CI/CD Pipeline

- [ ] All CI checks pass
- [ ] Security scan results reviewed
- [ ] No critical vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Docker images build successfully (if applicable)
